cd384017-7eac-4e06-b94b-d29b5b0395ec: A creature that steps into boiling water takes {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}2d6{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}fire damage{/g}.
bf26eab4-15b0-47c9-b125-fa84f014ca52: An unstable burst of energy caused by a {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damaged{/g} wild magic emitter deals {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}3d8{/g} {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}electricity damage{/g} to nearby creatures. A successful {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Reflex save{/g} halves this damage.
e45ec73a-667e-4ae9-a430-e6e01a14122e:
Shadow {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spells{/g} function as if their {g|Encyclopedia:Caster_Level}caster level{/g} was 2 higher than normal and are 10% more real.
To cast spells that use or generate light or fire, the caster must make a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g} ({g|Encyclopedia:DC}DC{/g} 20 + the level of the spell). If the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} fails, the spell does not function but is still lost as a prepared spell or spell slot. If the check succeeds, the spell functions normally.
e1d400cc-df17-4d74-a402-9f5f0d4381c0: This character is in a field of wild magic â€” a rare phenomenon that radically changes magical constants. Every time a creature casts a {g|Encyclopedia:Spell}spell{/g}, uses a {g|Encyclopedia:Special_Abilities}spell-like ability{/g}, or activates a magic item, it must perform a {g|Encyclopedia:Concentration}concentration check{/g}. If the {g|Encyclopedia:Check}check{/g} fails, the spell is wasted, but another random spell is cast on the same target instead.
d23d1ad7-089c-4a2c-a247-806beb7fbd95: This magic wave generator looks unstable. Damaging it will result in a release of energy that will affect everyone in the vicinity.
4e0e2380-c6eb-4764-9b8e-a3e143881cec:
When exposed to the shadow veil, creatures not native to the Plane of Shadow take {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Energy_Damage}negative energy damage{/g} each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g}. This is a mind-affecting fear effect.
The light of the Dispeller of Darkness prevents the {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g}.
1ce2ec3f-41b6-4cad-bf51-efffe3b5d8ad:
You gain a +2 profane {g|Encyclopedia:Bonus}bonus{/g} on {g|Encyclopedia:Saving_Throw}Will saving throws{/g}.
Whenever an enemy confirms a {g|Encyclopedia:Critical}critical hit{/g} against you, it leaves a scar on your body. With each scar, you gain a +1 natural armor bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Armor_Class}AC{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Damage_Reduction}DR{/g} 2/-. While you are in combat and conscious, the scars continuously bleed, dealing {g|Encyclopedia:Dice}1d4{/g} points of {g|Encyclopedia:Damage}damage{/g} to you each {g|Encyclopedia:Combat_Round}round{/g} for every scar you have. You cannot have more than 10 scars at a time.
All {g|Encyclopedia:Healing}healing{/g} received by you is halved. Whenever your {g|Encyclopedia:HP}hit points{/g} drop below half of their maximum, you gain a +4 profane bonus to {g|Encyclopedia:Strength}Strength{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Dexterity}Dexterity{/g} and {g|Encyclopedia:Concealment}concealment{/g} (20% miss chance) for 2 rounds.
Whenever you are affected by a compulsion, charm, or fear effect or an effect that would cause you to become {g|ConditionStaggered}staggered{/g} or {g|ConditionConfusion}confused{/g}, you take damage equal to your weapon's damage, and the effect immediately ends.
You gain a +2 profane bonus on {g|Encyclopedia:Attack}attack{/g} and damage rolls made with flails.
